Title: Movie Search
Description: Movies search is an easy application to use. Just search for a movie and in return you will get information about that movie such as actors, directors, plot etc.

Title: Local Wire
Description: Local Wire is an application for you to see the nearest local breweries, restaurants, and events. All you have to do is enter your city and you'll get your results. However, just keep in mind if you want to see the events going on, you have to enter a start date and end date.

Title: Employee Directory
Description: Employee Directory was built using React. You can enter employees name in the search bar to shorten the list of employees.

Title: Password Generator
Description: You will be able to generate a password and have the option to choose between lowercase, uppercase, number, and symbol. Character length has to be a min of 8 characters and max of 128 characters.

Title: Weather Dashboard
Description: I built this application to let you check the weather in the state that you're in. You will be able to check the temperature, humidity, wind speed, and UV index for the current day & the next five day forecast.

Title: Code Quiz
Description: Code quiz is an application that will give you 50 seconds to answer 5 coding question. But beware, for ever wrong question that you get wrong, you'll lose 6 seconds off the timer. Good luck and have fun ðŸ˜„ when you finish enter your initals to keep track of your score.

Title: Note Taker
Description: Note Taker is an application that will let you add notes and also delete them. This application has data persistence, so you won't have to worry about losing your notes.
